Description: Seek and learn. Used to scry for hidden things and reveal new information.
Smite and cleanse. Used to punish evil and dispel magic.
Corrupt and wrong. Used to raise the dead and subvert the natural order.
Speak and understand. Used to communicate with all manner of creatures, including animals and monsters.
Restore and repair. Used to heal wounds and mend broken objects.
Seal and repel. Used to create barriers and push targets away.
Allows for control and limited manifestation of electricity.
Allows for control and limited manifestation of air.
Allows for control and limited manifestation of earth.
Allows for control and limited manifestation of flame.
Allows for control and limited manifestation of water.
Allows for control and limited manifestation of magnetism.
Adhere and restrain. Used to lash things together with gravitational force.
Dissolve and decay. Used to unravel targets into their base elements.
Brighten and dim. Used to create and manipulate illusory images.
Accelerate and slow. Used to manipulate kinetic energy.
Amplify and quiet. Used to create and manipulate sound.
Heat and cool. Used to manipulate thermal energy.
